endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all available properties.
Add a new property to the listings, including necessary details and media.
Retrieve details and media for a specific property by its ID.
Update details or add media for an existing property.
Remove a specific property from the listings.
Search properties using specific filters, such as price range, location, and size.
Retrieve the virtual tour data for a specific property.
Submit user feedback about the virtual tour of a specific property.
Initiate augmented reality visualizations for specified properties.
Retrieve a list of realtors associated with the properties.
